creditline: Lent by Richard and Diana Rose
description: gray; one-piece unit; stylized, organic shape, tapers towards bottom; push buttons on underside of hand-set; attaches to oval, plastic wall piece with notch that fits into ear piece; black cord attached to bottom of phone; housed in aqua and gray original packaging box
dimension: 10 7/8 x 2 1/4 x 2 in. (27.62 x 5.72 x 5.08 cm) (without cord)
text: The celebrated French designer Philippe Starck quite likely inherited a penchant for innovation from his inventor father.  He has made a life-long commitment to the notion that "it is better to make a creative mistake than a stagnant work in good taste."  This wall phone's organic form and color suggest a primeval leech clinging to the wall, an association the mischievous Starck assuredly intended.
title: Wall phone
